| **Job Title** | Stock Controller | **Department:** | Operations |
| **Incumbent** |  | **Reports to:** | Team Leader |
| **Date** |  |  |  |

Position Overview

* Handling of Raw Material and Finished Goods
* Compliance with BRCGSrequirements**.**

Essential Job Functions

* Comply with the OHS Act.
* Comply with BRCGS requirements.
* Receiving of Raw materials in prescribed manner.
* Housekeeping & Cleaning of Warehouse
* Packing of Finished Goods cartons in requisite manner.
* Picking of Finished Goods.
* Monthly Stock Take
* Delivery of Finished Goods. (Driver)
* Operation of Forklift.

Requirements

* Ability to lift and pack cartons weighing more than >12kg’s from pallet on to shelves
* Exposure to manufacturing environment advantageous.
* Valid South African Driver’s License.
* Valid Forklift License

Other Skills/Abilities

* Initiative
* Attention to detail
* Ability to project a positive image of Kangopak while interacting with external parties

Employee Operations Manager

Date
